headline: Citius Oncology Signs U.S. Distribution Agreement with McKesson to Support LYMPHIR™ Commercial Launch
summary: Citius Oncology, Inc. ("Citius Oncology") (Nasdaq: CTOR), the oncology-focused subsidiary of Citius Pharmaceuticals, Inc. ("Citius Pharma") (Nasdaq: CTXR), today announced it has entered into a distribution services agreement with McKesson Corporation (NYSE: MCK), one of the largest pharmaceutical distributors and healthcare services companies in North America. Under the agreement, McKesson will serve as an authorized distributor of record for LYMPHIR (denileukin diftitox-cxdl), a novel immunoth
